mapper.select: select t.*,(select name from t_accountRank r where t.rank=r.code) rankName ,(select username from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) username ,(select saleCode from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) saleCode from t_account t where 1=1 and account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%') and trueName like CONCAT('%',#{trueName},'%') and companyName like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%') and tel like CONCAT('%',#{tel},'%') and status=#{status} and freeze=#{freeze} and regeistDate >= #{startDate} and regeistDate <= #{endDate} and syncState= #{syncState} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_account where 1=1 and account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%') and trueName like CONCAT('%',#{trueName},'%') and companyName like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%') and tel like CONCAT('%',#{tel},'%') and status=#{status} and freeze=#{freeze} and regeistDate >= #{startDate} and regeistDate <= #{endDate} and syncState= #{syncState}
mapper.insert: insert into t_account ( id,lastLoginTime ,account ,nickname ,password ,city ,address ,postcode ,cardType ,cardNO ,grade ,amount ,tel ,email ,freeze ,lastLoginIp ,activeCode ,accPrice ) values ( id,now() ,#{account} ,#{nickname} ,#{password} ,#{city} ,#{address} ,#{postcode} ,#{cardType} ,#{cardNO} ,#{grade} ,#{amount} ,#{tel} ,#{email} ,#{freeze} ,#{lastLoginIp} ,#{activeCode} ,#{accPrice} )
mapper.update: update t_account set id=#{id} ,account=#{account} ,nickname=#{nickname} ,trueName=#{trueName} ,password=#{password} ,city=#{city} ,address=#{address} ,postcode=#{postcode} ,cardType=#{cardType} ,cardNO=#{cardNO} ,grade=#{grade} ,amount=#{amount} ,tel=#{tel} ,email=#{email} ,freeze=#{freeze} ,lastLoginTime=now() ,lastLoginIp=#{lastLoginIp} ,lastLoginArea=#{lastLoginArea} ,diffAreaLogin=#{diffAreaLogin} ,freezeStartdate=#{freezeStartdate} ,freezeEnddate=#{freezeEnddate} ,companyName=#{companyName} ,companyBank=#{companyBank} ,bankAccountName=#{bankAccountName} ,bankNo=#{bankNo} ,taxNo=#{taxNo} ,phone=#{phone} ,paymentType=#{paymentType} ,saleId=#{saleId} ,saleCode=#{saleCode} ,saleDeptId=#{saleDeptId} ,discntSolutnId=#{discntSolutnId} ,corporate=#{corporate} ,jobTitle=#{jobTitle} ,bossName=#{bossName} ,bossPhone=#{bossPhone} ,busLicenseScan=#{busLicenseScan} ,taxCertificateScan=#{taxCertificateScan} ,nature=#{nature} ,ltd=#{ltd} ,ltdName=#{ltdName} ,products=#{products} ,productsName=#{productsName} ,annualSales=#{annualSales} ,purchaseType=#{purchaseType} ,status=#{status} ,activeCode=#{activeCode} ,accountBrand=#{accountBrand} ,syncState=#{syncState} ,accType=#{accType} ,auditUser=#{auditUser} ,auditTime=#{auditTime} ,discount=#{discount} ,expressType=#{expressType} ,expressCode=#{expressCode} ,expressOther=#{expressOther} ,isServiceFee=#{isServiceFee} ,isOtherFee=#{isOtherFee} ,pline=#{pline} ,auditStatus=#{auditStatus} ,isSysAccount=#{isSysAccount} ,accPrice=#{accPrice} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * ,(select username from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) username,(select nickname from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) name,(select discount from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) discounts,(select otherDiscount from t_user a where t.saleId =a.id) otherDiscount,(select name from t_discntsulotn o where t.discntSolutnId =o.id) discntSolutnName from t_account t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and account=#{account} and password=#{password}
select t.* from t_account t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_account where 1=1 and id=#{id}
